title: Invest your thought to secure the life of your family (Mihir Shah)
text: By Mihir Shah Aug 12, 2015 Everyone in life looks for some sort of financial security so that their family donot strangle in this complex world of uncertainties. While there are numerous investment products available in the market, life insurance is the key that can unlock the doors of your satisfaction and ensure the required security against all your concerns. While there are lots of insurance products available in the bouquet of various insurance companies in India, one insurance product which blossoms for entire year and releases the fragrance of satisfaction and relaxation for the insured is "Term insurance" plans. It is the simplest and most fundamental insurance product designed to ensure that in the event of the policyholder's death, the family gets the sum assured (the cover amount). These plans are ideally suited for people who are the single bread-earner of the family with high financial liabilities. Usually, low income, high financial liabilities, dependent spouse and children, or siblings at times are the driving factors for the choice of term insurances. Therefore, Term plan would be an ideal platform through which your family members and dependents will not only live a secured life but will also hold their head high in society if you're not around.It is advised to start at a younger age as premiums will be low. Also, when the insured is young, he/she can avail longer term coverage such as for 30 years. Term plans are no frills products that give us very high life covers at very low premiums. Today, most of the other insurance plans are built around these plans or have the term plans as a part of them. With the rapid online technology all you need to do is check your eligibility and apply while sipping a cup of coffee at your house. Today, a person can secure his or her family future easily by getting financial coverage with the help of a term insurance plans. There are various types of term plans available in the markets which have a simple application process where you can easily apply. All you need to do is to fill a simple form related to health, in which you need to provide your medical conditions and take care of some minor documentation work.Secondly term plans are available at low prices. You can compare policies and choose the best plan which suits your need suitably. By comparing, you ensure that you get what you wanted and it just takes a few minutes to make an informed choice. The online medium offers quick and hassle-free access to all kinds of insurance plans from the comfort of your home. It also saves your valuable time and energy. Buying a Term insurance policy helps your family members feel safe and secure with no worries related to managing finances when you're not around. It also provides a sense of social security to the insured and it allows them to avail of income tax benefits under the Income Tax Act 1961 as well. Life has become so unpredictable that ensuring the safeguard of your near and dear ones is of prime concern. About the Author Hi, I am Mihir working with insurance company as insurance adviser owing good knowledge of various policies such as Retirement pension plan, life insurance plan, investment plan, child plan, term insurance plans and so on.
